DINNER.name: Fried Calamari
DINNER.desc: Delicious, tender, crispy, & crunchy calamari served with mild or hot marinara sauce for dipping

DINNER.name: Fried Roman Artichokes
DINNER.desc: Crispy-fried baby artichokes with lemon and salsa verde

DINNER.name: Crab-Stuffed Jalapeño Popper
DINNER.desc: Fresh jalapeno peppers stuffed with lump crab meat & cheese, wrapped in bacon & smoked. Glazed with a tangy homemade BBQ sauce

DINNER.name: Mamas Meatballs and Sausage
DINNER.desc: Our homemade meatballs are a delicious combination of ground beef, garlic, cheese & bread served with sweet Italian sausage simmered in Mamas meat sauce

DINNER.name: Grilled Bruschetta with Fig Jam, Gorgonzola cheese & Prosciutto
DINNER.desc: Baked artisan bread char-grilled topped with delicate fig jam, gorgonzola cheese & sliced prosciutto

DINNER.name: Prince Edward Island Mussels
DINNER.desc: Fresh plump & juicy Canadian mussels simmered in a white wine, garlic, shallots & tomato sauce

DINNER.name: Panini Bay House Special
DINNER.desc: Fresh crisp romaine lettuce served with our balsamic vinaigrette, pimento olives, plum tomatoes & red onion confit

DINNER.name: Caesar Salad
DINNER.desc: Crisp romaine, our homemade Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons & parmigiana reggiano cheese

DINNER.name: Baby Greens & Goat Cheese
DINNER.desc: Baby greens, creamy goat cheese, red onion confit & balsamic vinaigrette

DINNER.name: Fresh Mozzarella and Tomato Salad
DINNER.desc: Chunks of fresh mozzarella, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion confit & balsamic vinaigrette. Served with grilled crostini

DINNER.name: Creamy Shrimp Linguine
DINNER.desc: Sautéed shrimp in a pink cream sauce flavored with white wine, prosciutto, shallots & parmesan cheese. Served over linguine pasta

DINNER.name: Authentic Bolognese
DINNER.desc: Ground veal, pork & beef slowly simmered with white wine, prosciutto, onion, carrots, cream & parmigiana reggiano cheese

DINNER.name: Mamas Meat Sauce or Marinara
DINNER.desc: Your choice of pasta with our deliciously rich slow simmered braised meat sauce or just marinara sauce. Dusted with pecorino romano cheese. Meat sauce 18 Marinara sauce

DINNER.name: White or Red Clam Sauce
DINNER.desc: Fresh local little neck clams from Parsons seafood, simmered in extra virgin olive oil, white wine & garlic. Served over imported linguini pasta

LUNCH.name: California BLT
LUNCH.desc: w/avocado, cucumber, arugula & tarragon mayo on multigrain bread

LUNCH.name: House Smoked Turkey Breast
LUNCH.desc: Panini Bay smoked turkey breast, crispy smoked bacon, creamy fontina cheese & mayo pressed with avocado slices

LUNCH.name: Classic Ham
LUNCH.desc: House-smoked ham, cheddar, pickles, spicy brown mustard

LUNCH.name: Roast Beef
LUNCH.desc: House-made roast beef, caramelized onions & our own blue cheese dressing on a soft roll

LUNCH.name: Frittata
LUNCH.desc: A delicious large Italian pecorino Romano cheese, parsley and egg omelet frittata over a salad that is dressed with our house balsamic vinaigrette and tomatoes

LUNCH.name: Tomato & Red Onion Salad
LUNCH.desc: Marinated tomatoes, balsamic, extra virgin olive oil, marinated red onions, and grilled baguette

LUNCH.name: Red and White Clams and Linguini
LUNCH.desc: Parsons little neck clams simmered with fresh garlic, olive oil & fresh Italian parsley served on imported Italian linguini

LUNCH.name: Crispy Fish Filet
LUNCH.desc: Breaded fish of the day on a soft bun topped with creamy tartar sauce, slow roasted roma tomatoes, & lettuce

LUNCH.name: Blackened Fish Sandwich
LUNCH.desc: Fish of the day coated with Cajun seasonings and pan seared. Served on a bun with Cajun remoulade, lettuce and tomato

LUNCH.name: Black Bean Veggie Burger
LUNCH.desc: Vegetarian black bean burger topped with sliced avocado, pico de gallo & cilantro crema

LUNCH.name: Sirloin Burger
LUNCH.desc: Cooked on an open flame served with romaine lettuce, tomato, red onion, cottage fries & pickle on an artisan baked soft bun

LUNCH.name: Concordia Sagittaria Salad
LUNCH.desc: Baby kale, spinach, arugula, artichoke hearts, heart of palm, cucumbers, goat cheese, fresh tomatoes & balsamic vinaigrette

LUNCH.name: Four Cheese Raviolis
LUNCH.desc: Fresh pasta stuffed with ricotta, mozzarella, asiago & Pecorino Romano cheeses

LUNCH.name: Crispy Pork
LUNCH.desc: Crispy pork cutlet, sautéed spinach, roasted red peppers, balsamic on a soft bun

CATERING.name: Antipasto tray
CATERING.desc: Salami, prosciutto, sharp provolone, fresh mozzarella, artichoke hearts, marinated peppers, olives

CATERING.name: Sandwich and Wrap Platter
